DOC.brief_summary: Our design is to test in hospital practice a selection of immune parameters that could assess the pathophysiology and progression of periodontal lesions.
DOC.detailed_description: These parameters will be measured in 25 healthy volunteers and 25 moderate-to severe periodontal disese patients. Phagocytes will be tested phenotypically and functionally, both ex vivo and in vitro.
DOC.criteria: Persons appearing spontaneously at the consultation of parodontologie for parodontale disease, persons agreeing to undergo a sampling of blood intended for the search Presence of a chronic or pointed pathology, an age 18yearold subordinate or 65yearold superior, pregnant women,
